title: Restate the ordering postulates with extended real "less than"

blocks.name: axlttri
blocks.content: Ordering on reals satisfies strict trichotomy. Axiom 18 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory. (This restates ~ ax-pre-lttri with ordering on the extended reals.) (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)

blocks.name: axlttrn
blocks.content: Ordering on reals is transitive. Axiom 19 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory. This restates ~ ax-pre-lttrn with ordering on the extended reals. New proofs should use ~ lttr instead for naming consistency. (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)

blocks.name: axltadd
blocks.content: Ordering property of addition on reals. Axiom 20 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory. (This restates ~ ax-pre-ltadd with ordering on the extended reals.) (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm axltadd(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c0), clt, co(c2, caddc, c1))))
} = {
  3imtr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c0), clt, co(c2, caddc, c1)), wbr(c0, cltrr, c1), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c0), cltrr, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
  ax-pre-ltadd(c0, c1, c2)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cltrr, c1)))
  ltxrlt(c0, c1)
  3coml(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(co(c2, caddc, c0), clt, co(c2, caddc, c1)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c0), cltrr, co(c2, caddc, c1))))
  3impdi(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(co(c2, caddc, c0), clt, co(c2, caddc, c1)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c0), cltrr, co(c2, caddc, c1))))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c0, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(co(c2, caddc, c0), clt, co(c2, caddc, c1)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c0), cltrr, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c0), cr), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cr))
  readdcl(c2, c0)
  readdcl(c2, c1)
  ltxrlt(co(c2, caddc, c0), co(c2, caddc, c1))
}

blocks.name: axmulgt0
blocks.content: The product of two positive reals is positive. Axiom 21 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory. (This restates ~ ax-pre-mulgt0 with ordering on the extended reals.) (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm axmulgt0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1))))
} = {
  3imtr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wa(wbr(nat0, cltrr, c0), wbr(nat0, cltrr, c1)), wbr(nat0, cltrr, co(c0, cmul, c1)))
  ax-pre-mulgt0(c0, c1)
  bi2anan9(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wbr(nat0, cltrr, c0), wbr(nat0, cltrr, c1))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, cltrr, c0)), wcel(nat0, cr))
  ltxrlt(nat0, c0)
  mpan(wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wbr(nat0, cltrr, c1)), wcel(nat0, cr))
  ltxrlt(nat0, c1)
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, cltrr, co(c0, cmul, c1))), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr))
  0re()
  remulcl(c0, c1)
  ltxrlt(nat0, co(c0, cmul, c1))
}

blocks.name: axsup
blocks.content: A nonempty, bounded-above set of reals has a supremum. Axiom 22 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory. (This restates ~ ax-pre-sup with ordering on the extended reals.) (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm axsup(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  3impia(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))))
  3imtr4d(wa(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), cltrr, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s2))))))))
  3expia(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), cltrr, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s2))))))))
  ax-pre-sup(s0, s1, s2, c0)
  adantr(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0))))))
  rexbidva(s0, cr, wss(c0, cr), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0))))
  ralbidva(s1, c0, wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0)))
  an32s(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wb(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0))))
  sylan(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wb(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  adantr(wss(c0, cr), wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), cltrr, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s2)))))))))
  rexbidva(s0, cr, wss(c0, cr), wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))))), wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), cltrr, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s2)))))))
  anbi12d(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))))), wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), cltrr, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s2))))))
  ralbidva(s1, c0, wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cltrr, cv(s1))))
  notbid(wa(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cltrr, cv(s1)))
  an32s(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cltrr, cv(s1))))
  sylan(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cltrr, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  ssel2(c0, cr, cv(s1))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wb(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cltrr, cv(s1))))
  ltxrlt(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  ralbidva(s1, cr, wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))), wi(wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s2)))))
  imbi12d(wa(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s2))))
  adantll(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wb(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0))))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wb(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s0))))
  ltxrlt(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  adantlr(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wb(wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2))), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s2)))))
  rexbidva(s2, c0, wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s2)))
  an32s(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(cv(s2), c0), wb(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s2))))
  sylan(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s2), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wb(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s2))), wcel(cv(s2), cr))
  ssel2(c0, cr, cv(s2))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(s2), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wb(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), cltrr, cv(s2))))
  ltxrlt(cv(s1), cv(s2))
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, cr)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cr)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  diff.wss.s(s2, c0, cr)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), cr)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cr.s(s2)
}
